name: Peculiar Bloom
description: Critical hits cause flowers to grow from the wounds.

name: Warrior
description: Sentinel will attack first visible enemy within 17.5m.

name: Vaporize
description: Sentinel will deal 150 damage to an enemy within 2.3m.

name: Vacuum
description: Detects and collects items within 6.5m for its master, including mods.

name: Retarget
description: Sentinel will attack first visible enemy within 17.5m.

name: Thumper
description: Djinn will attack the first visible enemy within 35m.

name: Targeting Receptor
description: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack targets within 10m with 1 glaives.

name: Electro Pulse
description: Every 10s, Sentinel will continually zap an enemy within 15m, trapping them in a stunned state.

name: Swift Deth
description: Sentinel will attack the first visible enemy within 17.5m.

name: Molecular Conversion
description: Blast enemies within 10m, converting 50 damage into shields for the Warframe

name: Sanctuary
description: Creates a shield with 100 health around the player when they are reviving fallen allies.

name: Sacrifice
description: Sentinel takes 7s to revive its downed owner to 25% health and shields, destroying itself after the process.

name: Revenge
description: Sentinel will not attack an enemy unless that enemy has attacked the Sentinel's master within 5.8m.

name: Reawaken
description: Upon death, automatically revives itself after 165s.

name: Regen
description: If killed, regenerates 1x with 58% Max Health and is invulnerable for 1s.

name: Negate
description: Sentinel prevents status effects from applying to its owner once every 15s.

name: Primed Regen
description: If killed, regenerates 1x with 50% Max Health and is invulnerable for 1s.

name: Ammo Case
description: An unused, unfused artifact.,Increases ammunition capacity by 5% and converts ammo pickups into ammo for equipped weapons after 5s.

name: Calculated Shot
description: Sentinel charges a powerful shot and fires at the first enemy within 40.8m.

name: Guardian
description: Boosts owner's shield by 58% when it runs out.

name: Ghost
description: Cloaks owner when enemies are within 5.8m. The cloak is disrupted if owner attacks.

name: Crowd Dispersion
description: Unleashes a 6.0m radial knockdown when multiple enemies are nearby, dealing 6.0 damage.

name: Coolant Leak
description: Sentinel has a 3m freeze aura, slowing incoming enemies by 10%.

name: Investigator
description: Helios Sentinel will scan objects and enemies within 20m over 5s. This consumes codex scanner charges.

name: Striker
description: Carrier will attack the first visible enemy within 5.8m

name: Fatal Attraction
description: Enemies within 10m will be attracted. Once they come within 3.5m, explode for 100 damage.

name: Arc Coil
description: Sentinel will zap up to 2 enemies within 10m, dealing 100 <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity damage with a 10% status chance.

name: Medi-Ray
description: Sentinel will occasionally heal its owner,,restoring 2% health over 4s

name: Shield Charger
description: Increases Max Shields by 10% and Shield Regen by 10% for 5s.

name: Unleashed
description: The kubrow grapples a VIP target within 35m, forcing them to the ground.

name: Scavenge
description: +15% chance for the pet to pry open a locked locker.

name: Protect
description: The kubrow comes to the defense of its master, replenishing their shields by 91.

name: Shelter
description: Creates a shield with 100 health around the player when they are reviving fallen allies.

name: Retrieve
description: The kubrow sniffs out loot hidden in crates and dropped by enemies within 10m, retrieving these items for its master.

name: Proboscis
description: Helminth Charger whips a proboscis out at an enemy within 15m, pulling them back and dealing 25 damage.

name: Howl
description: The kubrow cries out with a blood-curdling howl that strikes fear into 5 enemies within 4m for 6s.

name: Neutralize
description: The kubrow bites the hand of an enemy within 10m, causing them to drop their weapon.

name: Dig
description: The kubrow sniffs out buried objects and digs them up.,+45% Success Chance

name: Stalk
description: The kubrow cloaks itself and its master to stalk down its prey when they are within 14m.

name: Hunt
description: The kubrow charges ahead to attack an enemy, dealing 35 damage to all in its path.

name: Trample
description: The Helminth Charger rushes an enemy, dealing 35 damage to all in its path.

name: Sense Danger
description: The Kavat alerts their master of nearby enemies.

name: Swipe
description: Strikes 1 additional enemies and increases attack range by 0.5m.

name: Sharpened Claws
description: A vicious attack dealing 150% damage that sunders armour by 30% and rends flesh.

name: Reflect
description: Adarza Kavat has a 10% chance to reflect damage back to an enemy, amplifying it by 15%.

name: Pounce
description: The Kavat pounces at an enemy, stunning them for a short duration.

name: Territorial Aggression
description: The Kavat marks their territory, pacifying any wild creature within it.

name: Charm
description: Smeeta Kavat has a 7% chance every 30s to bestow its owner with good fortune.

name: Mischief
description: Allows Smeeta Kavat to become invisible for 6s every 10s while a decoy kavat draws fire. Decoy has a 0% chance to evade damage.

name: CatS Eye
description: Adarza Kavat grants 15% increased critical chance for 4s to allies within 15m every 50s.

name: Calm & Frenzy
description: Rest & Rage Augment: Killing an affected enemy causes the effect to spread to enemies within 2 meters for 40% of the remaining duration.

name: Push & Pull
description: Metamorphosis Augment: Switching to Day-form staggers enemies within 3m and knocks them down when switching to Night-form.

name: Duality
description: Metamorphosis Augment: Equinox's other half breaks free for 7 seconds, dealing 100% damage.

name: Energy Transfer
description: Mend & Maim Augment: |CONSERVATION|% of charge is conserved when switching between forms.,Mend & Maim Augment: 50% of charge is conserved when switching between forms.

name: Peaceful Provocation
description: Pacify & Provoke Augment: Pacify converts damage done to allies into an aura that slows enemies by 20%. Provoke converts damage done to enemies into 6% extra Ability Strength.

name: Kinetic Collision
description: Speed Augment: Running into an opponent increases the duration of Speed by 1 seconds.

name: Shocking Speed
description: Speed Augment: Enemies touched while sprinting under the effects of speed will take 75 electrical damage with guaranteed proc.

name: Shock Trooper
description: Shock Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% Electricity damage to their attacks for 28 seconds.

name: Recharge Barrier
description: Electric Shield Augment: Allies that pass through have 35 shields restored.

name: Transistor Shield
description: Allies can pick up Electric Shield. 25% of damage absorbed will be added to Volt's Static Discharge.

name: Capacitance
description: Discharge Augment: Converts 1.5% of damage dealt into shields split between Volt and allied Tenno.

name: Pool Of Life
description: Well of Life Augment: On death, marked enemies will drop 1 health orbs with a 10% chance of dropping an energy orb.

name: Abating Link
description: Link Augment: Reduces armor rating by 25% on enemies targeted by Link.

name: Vampire Leech
description: Energy Vampire Augment: Excess energy replenishes shields by 85%.

name: Tesla Link
description: Tesla Augment: Every pair of Teslas will connect forming a beam that will cause 100 Slash damage when contacted.

name: Perpetual Vortex
description: Vortex Augment: Vortex's duration is increased by 50% of its max duration for each additional Vortex thrown into it.

name: Repelling Bastille
description: Bastille Augment: When at max capacity, has a 50% chance to repel new enemies that enter the radius.

name: Jet Stream
description: Turbulence Augment: Turbulence increases movement speed by 20% and projectile speed by 50% for Zephyr and her allies.

name: Funnel Clouds
description: Tornado Augment: Creates 2 additional tornadoes. All tornadoes are 50% their original size and won't pick up enemies.

name: Target Fixation
description: Tail Wind Augment: Each enemy hit increases Tail Wind damage by 30%. Damage resets upon landing.

name: Contagion Cloud
description: Toxic Lash Augment: Create 2m toxic clouds, dealing 100 <DT_POISON>Toxin/s for 8s with every kill. Damage is twice as strong for Melee kills.

name: Regenerative Molt
description: Molt Augment: After casting Molt, Saryn regenerates 20 health every second for 10 seconds.

name: Venom Dose
description: Spores Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive damage to their attacks for 28 seconds.

name: Negation Swarm
description: Scarab Swarm Augment: Scarab armor protects Inaros from status effects, consuming 6% bonus armor for each effect resisted.

name: Elemental Sandstorm
description: Sandstorm Augment: Sandstorm has a 25% chance of inflicting status effects based on the damage types and mods on equipped melee weapon.

name: Reinforcing Stomp
description: Rhino Stomp Augment: Iron Skin health is replenished by |AMOUNT| for each enemy affected.,Rhino Stomp Augment: Iron Skin health is replenished by 55 for each enemy affected.

name: Ironclad Charge
description: Rhino Charge Augment: Each enemy hit increases Rhino's armor rating by 12% for 4s.

name: Piercing Roar
description: Roar Augment: Enemies within 10 meters will suffer from a puncture proc.

name: Iron Shrapnel
description: Iron Skin Augment: Recasting Iron Skin will cause it to detonate, dealing 40% of its remaining health as puncture damage, and knocking down enemies.

name: Infiltrate
description: Prowl Augment: Ivara is able to bypass laser barriers and gains |SPEED|% movement speed.,Prowl Augment: Ivara is able to bypass laser barriers and gains 10% movement speed.

name: Power Of Three
description: Quiver Augment: Quiver fires three arrows and consumes 50 more energy.

name: Piercing Navigator
description: Navigator Augment: Each hit increases the projectile's crit chance by 2.5% up to a max of 50%.

name: Concentrated Arrow
description: Artemis Bow Augment: Fires a single arrow that, on headshots, has +20% critical chance and explodes in a 7 meter radius. Removes punch through.

name: Lasting Covenant
description: Covenant Augment: Headshot kills increase crit chance bonus duration by |INCREASE| seconds.,Covenant Augment: Headshot kills increase crit chance bonus duration by 1 seconds.

name: Tidal Impunity
description: Tidal Surge Augment: Clears status effects and grants 3 seconds of proc immunity for yourself and allies that come in contact with it.

name: Curative Undertow
description: Undertow Augment: Allies can enter the pool to regain 15% health every 1.5 seconds, with each ally in the pool increasing energy drain on Hydroid.

name: Pilfering Swarm
description: Tentacle Swarm Augment: Enemies held by tentacles have a 25% chance at additional drops.

name: Corroding Barrage
description: Tempest Barrage Augment: Each projectile has a |CHANCE|% chance of inflicting a Corrosive status effect.,Tempest Barrage Augment: Each projectile has a 50% chance of inflicting a Corrosive status effect.

name: Hallowed Eruption
description: Hallowed Ground Augment: The next time this ability is cast it will consume the Hallowed Ground, dealing the remaining damage in a burst with 30% chance of Radiation proc.

name: Smite Infusion
description: Smite Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% Radiation damage to their attacks for 28 sec.

name: Phoenix Renewal
description: Renewal Augment: Taking fatal damage while under the effects of Renewal will instead heal you or allies to 20% health. This effect triggers only once for each ally every 90s.

name: Defiled Reckoning
description: Reckoning Augment: Health orbs become unusable by enemies for 2.5 seconds.

name: Hallowed Reckoning
description: Reckoning Augment: Enemies affected by Reckoning spawn zones that increase armor by 150 for allies and inflicts 100 damage to enemies over 7 sec.

name: Fatal Teleport
description: Teleport Augment: Teleport will perform a finisher on the target, dealing 125% extra damage. 50% of energy cost is refunded on a kill.

name: Tear Gas
description: Smoke Screen Augment: Blinds enemies within 1 meters for 3 seconds.

name: Smoke Shadow
description: Smoke Screen Augment: Conceals allies for 2 seconds.

name: Rising Storm
description: Blade Storm Augment: Melee multiplier lasts 50% longer before it resets.

name: Seeking Shuriken
description: Shuriken Augment: Hits expose weaknesses on enemies, reducing their armor by 35% for 2 seconds.

name: Pyroclastic Flow
description: Fire Walker Augment: Accumulate 75% of the damage Fire Walker deals, unleashing it in a trail of fire that lasts 6s.

name: Ward Recovery
description: Warding Halo Augment: 35% of the casting cost returned based on how much protection is left.

name: Safeguard
description: Warding Halo Augment: Can now be cast on allies with 20% effectiveness.

name: Reaping Chakram
description: Blazing Chakram Augment: The chakram flies through enemies. Each enemy hit increases it's damage and healing by 1.25x.

name: Creeping Terrify
description: Terrify Augment: Affected enemies have |SLOW_PCT|% reduced movement speed.,Terrify Augment: Affected enemies have 30% reduced movement speed.

name: Discharge Strike
description: Soul Punch Augment: Depletes up to 10 energy from the target.

name: Soul Survivor
description: Soul Punch Augment: Use on a downed ally to revive him with 15% of health. Nekros's energy will be consumed.

name: Despoil
description: Desecrate Augment: No longer consumes energy, but consumes 16 health per corpse instead.

name: Shield Of Shadows
description: Shadows of the Dead Augment: Shadows within 50 meters each take 3% of the damage done to Nekros in his stead.

name: Primal Rage
description: Primal Fury Augment: Killing an enemy increases Critical Chance by |CHANCE|%. The increase decays by |DECAY|% per second.,Primal Fury Augment: Killing an enemy increases Critical Chance by 6%. The increase decays by 1% per second.

name: Iron Vault
description: Iron Jab Augment: Aiming Iron Jab at the ground launches Wukong into the air. Executing a slam attack increases range by |RANGE|m and applies |DAMAGE|% extra damage.,Iron Jab Augment: Aiming Iron Jab at the ground launches Wukong into the air. Executing a slam attack increases range by 8m and applies 300% extra damage.

name: Rift Torrent
description: Rift Surge Augment: Limbo deals 15% Extra Damage for each enemy affected by Rift Surge while in the rift.

name: Cataclysmic Continuum
description: Cataclysm Augment: Duration increased by 0.3s for each enemy killed.

name: Haven
description: Banish Augment: Allies banished to the rift will have 10% of their max health restored.

name: Shield Overload
description: Polarize Augment: Increases the time for the target's shields to regenerate by 4 seconds.

name: Counter Pulse
description: Polarize Augment: Enemy weapons are jammed and robotics are disabled for 2s when hit by Polarize.

name: Sapping Reach
description: Pull Augment: Steals up to 10 energy from the target.

name: Greedy Pull
description: Pull Augment: Adds 40% chance to pull pickups towards Mag.

name: Fracturing Crush
description: Crush Augment: Survivors have their armor decreased by 20% and become unable to move for 4 seconds.

name: Magnetized Discharge
description: Manually detonate Magnetize by recasting on the target. Enemies hit have a 20% chance to become disarmed.

name: Safeguard Switch
description: Switch Teleport Augment: After teleporting with an ally they will be invulnerable for 3 seconds.

name: Hushed Invisibility
description: Invisibility Augment: Weapon noise is reduced by 50% while invisible.

name: Irradiating Disarm
description: Radial Disarm Augment: Enemies will be affected by Radiation for 4 seconds.

name: Deceptive Bond
description: Decoy Augment: 20% of damage Loki takes is transferred to Decoy, and vice versa.

name: Savior Decoy
description: Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases casting speed of Decoy by |SPEED|%,Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases casting speed of Decoy by 20%

name: Singularity
description: Absorb Augment: Creates a ring every 3 seconds that drags in enemies at 9 meters per second.

name: Assimilate
description: Absorb Augment: Nyx can move at 30% speed while using Absorb, but the area is reduced by half.

name: Mind Freak
description: Mind Control Augment: Controlled target does increased damage by 200%.

name: Pacifying Bolts
description: Psychic Bolts Augment: Affected enemies will be confused for 4 seconds.

name: Chaos Sphere
description: Chaos Augment: Enemies entering the effect range will be inflicted with Chaos. Effect range lasts for 25% of the ability duration and shrinks over time.

name: Larva Burst
description: Larva Augment: Reactivate larva to detonate and deal |DAMAGE| toxin damage in |RANGE|m range. This damage stacks for every enemy grabbed by the Larva.,Larva Augment: Reactivate larva to detonate and deal 150 toxin damage in 1m range. This damage stacks for every enemy grabbed by the Larva.

name: Prism Guard
description: Prism Augment: Prism follows above Mirage for 1 seconds.

name: Explosive Legerdemain
description: Sleight of Hand Augment: Ammo and orbs pickups are turned into proximity mines that deal 150 damage with a 15% proc chance.

name: Total Eclipse
description: Eclipse Augment: While active, allies within 3 meters gain 25% benefit from Eclipse.

name: Hall Of Malevolence
description: Hall of Mirrors Augment: The damage of your doppelgangers is increased by 2% every time you kill an enemy.

name: Freeze Force
description: Freeze Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% Cold damage to their attacks for 28 seconds.

name: Ice Wave Impedance
description: Ice Wave Augment: Leaves a frozen trail for 6 seconds, that will slow down enemies that come into contact with it.

name: Chilling Globe
description: Snow Globe Augment: Enemies that enter have a 30% chance to become frozen solid for 4 seconds.

name: Icy Avalanche
description: Avalanche Augment: Grants allies within the radius a coat of ice that absorbs |ABSORB| damage per enemy hit.,Avalanche Augment: Grants allies within the radius a coat of ice that absorbs 40 damage per enemy hit.

name: Beguiling Lantern
description: Lantern Augment: Attracted enemies take 25% more melee damage.

name: Razorwing Blitz
description: Razor Wing Augment: Flight speed increased by |INCREASE|% and fire rate increased by |FIRE_RATE_INCREASE|% for |DURATION|s when using abilities. Stacks up to 4 times.,Razor Wing Augment: Flight speed increased by 25% and fire rate increased by 25% for 2s when using abilities. Stacks up to 4 times.

name: Chromatic Blade
description: Exalted Blade's damage type changes depending on energy color and status chance is increased by 25%.

name: Purging Slash
description: Slash Dash Augment: Allies in the path of Slash Dash have 1 debuffs removed 100 shields restored.

name: Surging Dash
description: Slash Dash Augment: Each enemy hit during Slash Dash further increases your melee counter by 1.

name: Furious Javelin
description: Radial Javelin Augment: Each enemy hit will increase Excalibur's melee damage by 3% for 6 seconds.

name: Signal Flare
description: Radial Blind Augment: Enemies blinded are marked on the minimap for 3 seconds.

name: Radiant Finish
description: Radial Blind Augment: Blinded enemies take 150% more finisher damage.

name: Firequake
description: World On Fire Augment: Enemies hit have a 50% chance of being knocked down.

name: Flash Accelerant
description: Accelerant Augment: Accelerant gives +20% casting speed and +50% <DT_FIRE>Heat damage to allies within range.

name: Purifying Flames
description: Fire Blast Augment: Allies that enter the fire will have up to 1 debuffs removed.

name: Fire Fright
description: Fire Blast Augment: Damage done by Fire Blast has a 40% chance to cause enemies to panic.

name: Fireball Frenzy
description: Fireball Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% Fire damage to their attacks for 28 seconds.

name: Vexing Retaliation
description: Vex Armor Augment: Taking 150 damage will trigger a 4m burst. Shield damage will cause a puncture proc while health damage will cause a blast proc.

name: Guided Effigy
description: Cast and hold to make Effigy move to your aim point. Deals 500 damage per second to enemies in its path and roars on arrival stunning nearby enemies.

name: Everlasting Ward
description: Elemental Ward Augment: Allies that leave the radius will retain the effect for 50% of the remaining duration.

name: Afterburn
description: Spectral Scream Augment: Upon deactivation, Chroma will launch an elemental projectile dealing 25 damage for each second the ability was active, to a maximum of 200 damage.

name: Muzzle Flash
description: Shooting Gallery Augment: Does a burst before switching between players, blinding enemies within |RANGE| meters for |DURATION| seconds.,Shooting Gallery Augment: Does a burst before switching between players, blinding enemies within 5 meters for 4 seconds.

name: Staggering Shield
description: Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a |PROC_PCT|% chance of staggering enemies.,Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a 30% chance of staggering enemies.

name: Mesa'S Waltz
description: Peacemaker Augment: Mesa can move at 35% speed while using Peacemaker.

name: Ballistic Bullseye
description: Ballistic Battery Augment: Applies a |PROC_CHANCE|% status chance bonus to the shot, based on the amount charged.,Ballistic Battery Augment: Applies a 70% status chance bonus to the shot, based on the amount charged.

name: Rumbled
description: Rumblers Augment: Atlas becomes a Rumbler with rock armor that can absorb up to 350 damage.

name: Titanic Rumbler
description: Rumblers Augment: Create a single rumbler with 120% health, 120% damage, and 50% speed that taunts nearby enemies into attacking it.

name: Path Of Statues
description: Landslide Augment: Leave a trail for 7s that petrifies enemies for 4s.

name: Ore Gaze
description: Petrify Augment: Petrified enemies are scanned into the codex and have a 10% chance to drop additional loot when killed.

name: Tectonic Fracture
description: Tectonics Augment: Create up to 2 walls with 70% health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.

name: Prolonged Paralysis
description: Paralysis Augment: Affected enemies are pulled towards Valkyr and the stun duration is increased by 50%.

name: Hysterical Fixation
description: Hysteria Augment: While Hysteria is active, each kill restores 5% max shields.

name: Hysterical Assault
description: Hysteria Augment: Use Secondary Fire to leap onto enemies up to 15m away.

name: Eternal War
description: Warcry Augment: While active, Warcry's duration is increased by 1.25 seconds for each melee kill.

name: Swing Line
description: Rip Line Augment: After using Rip Line, the next 1 Rip Lines will have no energy cost while airborne.

name: Resonance
description: Sonar Augment: Killing an enemy by shooting the weak spot will trigger another Sonar for 50% of remaining duration.

name: Savage Silence
description: Silence Augment: Finisher damage is increased by 150% while Silence is active.

name: Sonic Fracture
description: Sonic Boom Augment: Enemy armor is reduced by 35% for 2 seconds.

name: Resonating Quake
description: Sound Quake Augment: Deals 10 times damage at the epicenter, weakening as the shockwave expands.

name: Cold Snap
description: Cosmic Crush Augment: The black hole saps the area of heat, freezing enemies in range. Enemies near the black hole are completely frozen for |val| seconds.,Cosmic Crush Augment: The black hole saps the area of heat, freezing enemies in range. Enemies near the black hole are completely frozen for 2 seconds.

name: Energy Field
description: Energy Shell Augment: Energy Shell applies to allies within 80m.

name: Afterburner
description: Core Vent Augment: <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast damage ignites exhaust fumes for |DURATION|s. Enemies passing through the flames take |DAMAGE| <DT_FIRE>Heat damage.,Core Vent Augment: <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast damage ignites exhaust fumes for 6s. Enemies passing through the flames take 200 <DT_FIRE>Heat damage.

name: Escape Velocity
description: Worm Hole Augment: Allies that travel through wormhole gain a 30% speed bonus for 4 seconds.

name: Neutron Star
description: Null Star Augment: Recasting Null Star will make all remaining particles explode, doing 60 Blast area damage with guaranteed proc in 4 meters.

name: Antimatter Mine
description: Antimatter Drop Augment: Creates a fully charged stationary orb that explodes after 12s or within enemy proximity.

name: Antimatter Absorb
description: Antimatter Drop Augment: Absorbs enemy bullets within 1 meters, increasing its damage when it explodes.

name: Power Drift
description: +2.5% Ability Strength,+5% Chance to Resist Knockdown

name: Agility Drift
description: Reduced damage by 2% while airborne,+1% Evasion
